name: Women, Infants & Children (WIC)
description: Women, Infants & Children (WIC) is a special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children. WIC can provide your family with the following services: Nutritious food (WIC cards) Breastfeeding support Individual and group nutrition education Referral to other resources in Alameda and San Francisco Counties Educational videos are available on the website: https://www.nativehealth.org/wic/
fullDescription: Women, Infants & Children (WIC) is a special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children. WIC can provide your family with the following services: Nutritious food (WIC cards) Breastfeeding support Individual and group nutrition education Referral to other resources in Alameda and San Francisco Counties Educational videos are available on the website: https://www.nativehealth.org/wic/
whatTheyOffer: Women, Infants & Children (WIC) is a special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children. WIC can provide your family with the following services: Nutritious food (WIC cards) Breastfeeding support Individual and group nutrition education Referral to other resources in Alameda and San Francisco Counties Educational videos are available on the website: https://www.nativehealth.org/wic/
howToGetIt: To enroll in WIC visit: https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/1e3e634770d742f192c9477800767748 and complete the WIC referral form. WIC staff will use the information provided to contact the family in 1-2 business days. For any further questions or concerns call (510) 434-5300
